trans-unit.source: Provides the services for management of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Fornece os serviços para o gerenciamento de objetos <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> provides methods that you can use to manage the workflow queues associated with a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> fornece métodos que você pode usar para gerenciar as filas de fluxo de trabalho associadas a uma instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a method, named `CreateQueue`, that initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> object by calling the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.GetService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra um método chamado `CreateQueue`, que inicia um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> objeto chamando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.GetService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: The code then uses the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.Exists%2A> method to determine if a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> with a specified name exists.
trans-unit.target: O código usa o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.Exists%2A> método para determinar se um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> com um nome especificado existe.

trans-unit.source: If it does not exist, the code calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A> method; if it does the code calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.GetWorkflowQueue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se não existir, o código chama o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A> método; se ele faz o código chama o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.GetWorkflowQueue%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the File Watcher Activity SDK Sample from the FileSystemEvent.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do arquivo Inspetor atividade SDK exemplo do arquivo FileSystemEvent.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [File System Watcher Activity](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5442b63a-bdad-43d0-b7cf-f0b5d8b56a99).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [atividade do Inspetor de sistema de arquivo](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5442b63a-bdad-43d0-b7cf-f0b5d8b56a99).

trans-unit.source: The name of the queue.
trans-unit.target: O nome da fila.

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> is visible outside the scope of the current transaction.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que especifica se a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> está visível fora do escopo da transação atual.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> by using the specified name and transactional scope.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> usando o nome especificado e o escopo transacional.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> is created with the specified `queueName`.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> é criado com o `queueName`.

trans-unit.source: If transactional is `true`, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> is only visible inside the current transaction.
trans-unit.target: Se for transacional `true`, o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> só é visível dentro da transação atual.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a method, named `CreateQueue`, that initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> object by calling the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.GetService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra um método chamado `CreateQueue`, que inicia um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> objeto chamando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.GetService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: The code then uses the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.Exists%2A> method to determine if a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> with a specified name exists.
trans-unit.target: O código usa o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.Exists%2A> método para determinar se um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> com um nome especificado existe.

trans-unit.source: If it does not exist, the code calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A> method; if it does the code calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.GetWorkflowQueue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se não existir, o código chama o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A> método; se ele faz o código chama o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.GetWorkflowQueue%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the File Watcher Activity SDK Sample from the FileSystemEvent.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do arquivo Inspetor atividade SDK exemplo do arquivo FileSystemEvent.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [File System Watcher Activity](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5442b63a-bdad-43d0-b7cf-f0b5d8b56a99).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [atividade do Inspetor de sistema de arquivo](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5442b63a-bdad-43d0-b7cf-f0b5d8b56a99).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="queueName" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="queueName" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> with the name specified by <paramref name="queueName" /> already exists.
trans-unit.target: Já existe uma <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> com o nome especificado por <paramref name="queueName" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> to delete.
trans-unit.target: O nome da <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> a ser excluída.

trans-unit.source: Deletes the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Exclui a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a method that writes a string to the console, creates an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> by calling the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.GetService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra um método que grava uma cadeia de caracteres para o console, cria uma instância de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> chamando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.GetService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: Finally, the code calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.DeleteWorkflowQueue%2A> method to delete the queue associated with a `QueueName` property on the current workflow.
trans-unit.target: Finalmente, o código chama o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.DeleteWorkflowQueue%2A> método para excluir a fila associada a um `QueueName` propriedade do fluxo de trabalho atual.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the File Watcher Activity SDK Sample from the FileSystemEvent.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do arquivo Inspetor atividade SDK exemplo do arquivo FileSystemEvent.cs.

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="queueName" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.

trans-unit.source: Tests for the existence of the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: Testa a existência da <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> exists; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> existir, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a method, named `CreateQueue`, that initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> object by calling the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.GetService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.

trans-unit.source: The code then uses the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.Exists%2A> method to determine if a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> with a specified name exists.

trans-unit.source: If it does not exist, the code calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A> method; if it does the code calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.GetWorkflowQueue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se não existir, o código chama o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A> método; se ele faz o código chama o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.GetWorkflowQueue%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a method, named `CreateQueue`, that initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> object by calling the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.GetService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra um método chamado `CreateQueue`, que inicia um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> objeto chamando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.GetService%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: The code then uses the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.Exists%2A> method to determine if a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> with a specified name exists.
trans-unit.target: O código usa o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.Exists%2A> método para determinar se um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> com um nome especificado existe.

trans-unit.source: If it does not exist, the code calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A> method; if it does the code calls the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.GetWorkflowQueue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se não existir, o código chama o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A> método; se ele faz o código chama o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.GetWorkflowQueue%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="queueName" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="queueName" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> was not found.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue" /> especificada não foi encontrada.

trans-unit.source: Contains the unconsumed items in the workflow queues associated with this <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService" />.
trans-unit.target: Contém os itens não consumidos nas filas de fluxo de trabalho associados a este <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService" />.

trans-unit.source: When a workflow instance completes or terminates all of the unconsumed items in its workflow queues that are associated with this <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> are moved to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.PendingMessagesProperty>.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma instância de fluxo de trabalho é concluída ou encerra todos os itens não consumidos em suas filas de fluxo de trabalho que estão associados com esta <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService> são movidos para o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.PendingMessagesProperty>.
